hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: COMMIT_MESSAGE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Commit message for this set of changes

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
workspace_dir=$(pwd)
# Remove stored copies of repo so it is not included in the files added to repo rm -f repo.bundle
cd $JENKINS_HOME/. || exit 1
if [ ! -d $JENKINS_HOME/.git ]; then git config --global user.name "Jenkins User" && \ git config --global user.email mark.earl.waite@gmail.com && \ git init && \ echo .cache/ >> .gitignore && \ echo .config/ >> .gitignore && \ echo .dbus/ >> .gitignore && \ echo .java/ >> .gitignore && \ echo .jenkins/ >> .gitignore && \ echo .m2/ >> .gitignore && \ echo tools/ >> .gitignore && \ echo userContent/ >> .gitignore && \ echo war/ >> .gitignore && \ git add .gitignore fi
git add . git commit -m "$COMMIT_MESSAGE"
# Store git history bundle for import elsewhere git bundle create $workspace_dir/repo.bundle HEAD
